name: Meet Your Oshi
storyline:
Welcome to DweebCon! A pop culture convention you want to attend... Except all the tickets sold out before you got a chance to buy one! This might be your only chance to meet the new, high-tech animatronics based on your favorite vtuber group, VchiBan!

And you will meet your oshis, at any cost.
summary: It's your chance to meet your oshis -- all you have to do is survive the night! Five of them to be exact. Utilize point-and-click mechanics to assess cameras and maintain a printer that will DEFINITELY print a ticket -- eventually! Work to conserve power but be careful. Those oshis are just as eager to meet you and they hug really hard.
